subdisciplines.name: Metaethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the fundamental nature of ethics, including the nature of ethical facts, properties, and attitudes.

subdisciplines.name: Moral Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people perceive, reason, and act in moral situations.

subdisciplines.name: Moral Epistemology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how we know which moral claims are true or false, or more or less probable.
